definition: unceasing torrent (idiom)/talking non-stop/gabbling forty to the dozen
to cut short/extinct/to disappear/to vanish/absolutely/by no means

sentences.english: He completely monopolized the conversation last night; Mary and I couldn't get a word in edgeways.
sentences.chinese: 他昨晚滔滔不絕地講話，瑪麗和我完全插不上嘴。

sentences.english: People gushing on and on about their amazing love life?
sentences.chinese: 有人滔滔不絕地講述她們那讓人驚歎的愛情生活？

sentences.english: The whale only gets harpooned when he spouts.
sentences.chinese: 只有得到的鯨魚時，他滔滔不絕地鏢。

sentences.english: Every words poured out it echoes of your love.
sentences.chinese: 每次滔滔不絕的字都有你愛的迴音。

sentences.english: She talks so much that the rest of us never get a look-in .
sentences.chinese: 他講得滔滔不絕，別人都無法插嘴。

sentences.english: While the master quietly served tea, the professor talked about Zen.
sentences.chinese: 當禪師安靜地準備茶水時，學者滔滔不絕地談着禪。

sentences.english: Charles is such a gasser when he gets going about himself.
sentences.chinese: 查爾斯一談到自己，就勁頭十足，滔滔不絕。

sentences.english: The hired orators continued to pour forth their streams of eloquence.
sentences.chinese: 那些僱來的演說家繼續滔滔不絕地施展辯才。

sentences.english: Uncle Wang ran on, airing his views about the cases.
sentences.chinese: 王大爺滔滔不絕地談着，發表對這案件的看法。

sentences.english: He tried to Buy time by doing a lot of talking.
sentences.chinese: 他爲了爭取時間滔滔不絕地講個沒完。

sentences.english: Because who needs to hear people cursing like Tourette's patients on speed and failing to work together?
sentences.chinese: 有誰願意聽他們滔滔不絕的罵人並導致團隊解散嗎？

sentences.english: They are off and running with their description of their own experience.
sentences.chinese: 他們滔滔不絕地說着自己的經歷。

sentences.english: Mr. Blankfein talks about himself humorously and well.
sentences.chinese: 布蘭克芬談到自己時滔滔不絕，且言辭詼諧。

sentences.english: She talked at us about her family life.
sentences.chinese: 她對我們滔滔不絕地講她的家庭生活。

sentences.english: He gave me an earful of complaints about his new boss.
sentences.chinese: 他滔滔不絕向我抱怨他的新老闆。

sentences.english: He talked as volubly as ever.
sentences.chinese: 他還像從前一樣滔滔不絕地說着話。

definition: to recount/to narrate/to give an account of
not to accept as correct (idiom); to object/to disapprove/to take exception to
to sketch in light shades/to play down/to deemphasize (idiom)
to rain curses (on sb)/to let sb have it/to bawl sb out
not knowing anything at all (idiom); completely ignorant/without an inkling
to blurt out/to let slip (an indiscreet remark)
